metadata.title: CVE-2020-1983 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
A use after free vulnerability in ip_reass() in ip_input.c of libslirp 4.2.0 and prior releases allows crafted packets to cause a denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-1983` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libslirp0 - 4.1.0-2ubuntu2
No subscription required

slirp4netns - 1.0.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libslirp package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.1.0-2ubuntu2').
slirp4netns package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.1-1').
